page.title: 07WOMEN'S WORK-in a rural area
page.content: The majority of the female population between the ages of 18 and 45 are wives and mothers with children under 16.Being a wife and mother can be a full-time job but many choose or need to work as well as run their homes. A few "working women" can be found. These tend to be professional women who have returned to their careers after a few years at home raising young children.Their jobs are well paid and the children are generally in private education. Apart from these women others do some kind of part-time or casual work outside the home,mainly "cleaning ladies" for well-off retired people and also for "working women". Many wives of farmers and farm workers are involved in the everyday tasks of the farm both paper work and looking after animals.
